        public StateCheckpoint<Map<K,V>> update(StateCheckpoint<Map<K,V>> nextCheckpoint)
        Description copied from class: StateCheckpoint
        Updates the checkpoint from next one. Override this method to allow incremental updates.
        Overrides:
        update in class StateCheckpoint<Map<K,V>>

        nextCheckpoint - The StateCheckpoint will be used to update from.
